organization.name: NATIONAL DATA
organization.subtitle: ASSOCIATION
organization.description: A pioneering organization in developing the national data ecosystem, promoting comprehensive digital transformation in Vietnam.

footer.copyright: © 2025 NATIONAL DATA ASSOCIATION. All rights reserved.

slides.title: Building Vietnam's Digital Future
slides.subtitle: Vietnam National Data Association
slides.description: Where we connect, share and develop the data ecosystem for a strong and sustainable digital Vietnam.

slides.title: Connecting Global Experts
slides.subtitle: International Technology Network
slides.description: Join the world's leading technology expert community and share knowledge and experience.

slides.title: Innovation & Creativity
slides.subtitle: Advanced Technology
slides.description: Applying AI, Blockchain and advanced technologies in national data management.

mission.title: Mission
mission.content: Build and develop a national data ecosystem, connecting organizations, enterprises and experts to create sustainable value for society and Vietnam's digital economy.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: Become a leading organization in promoting national digital transformation, guiding data technology development and connecting Vietnam with the international community.

values.title: Core Values
values.content: Innovation - Connection - Sharing - Sustainable Development. We believe in the power of data and technology to create positive changes for the community.

features.title: Why Choose Us?
features.subtitle: We are committed to delivering leading data solutions that meet all the needs of businesses and organizations.

items.title: National Data Management
items.description: Building centralized, secure and efficient data management systems

items.title: Security & Compliance
items.description: Ensuring information security and compliance with legal regulations

items.title: International Cooperation
items.description: Connecting and sharing experiences with global data organizations

items.title: Innovation & Creativity
items.description: Promoting the application of new technologies in data management

video.description: Explore advanced technology and national data networks

header.title: About Vietnam National Data Association
header.subtitle: Learn about the mission, vision and organizational structure of Vietnam National Data Association

stats.title: National Data Association - Outstanding Achievements
stats.subtitle: Officially launched on March 22, 2025 at the Ministry of Public Security Hall

mission.title: Mission
mission.content1: The National Data Association is a socio-professional organization of Vietnamese organizations and citizens operating in the data field, aiming to unite, rally members, and protect legitimate rights and interests of members.
mission.content2: Pioneer in implementing Resolution No. 57-NQ/TW on breakthrough in science, technology, innovation and national digital transformation into daily life.
mission.content3: Become the "Common House of Digital Knights", making Vietnam a digital nation with "accurate - sufficient - clean - living" data.

tasks.title: Key Tasks
tasks.legal: Participate in contributing opinions to legal documents related to data
tasks.data: Build, develop, exploit national data (4 pillars: people, location, activities, products)
tasks.technology: Master AI, Big Data, Blockchain, Cloud Computing technologies
tasks.promotion: Coordinate in promoting data policies and laws

development.title: Development Orientation under the Direction of General Secretary To Lam

market.title: Data Market Development
market.content: Build national data market, deploy data platforms to serve research, startup development, and innovation.

ai.title: Build Open AI Platform
ai.content: Help businesses easily access AI applications, especially Vietnamese AI.

education.title: Popularize Data Knowledge
education.content: Raise awareness, knowledge and data skills for the whole society.

competition.title: Organize Innovation Competitions
competition.content: Create playground to maximize human potential in science and technology.

autonomy.title: Data Technology Autonomy
autonomy.content: Create mechanisms for "Made in Vietnam" products to compete fairly in the market.

infrastructure.title: Build Data Infrastructure
infrastructure.content: Support building advanced data infrastructure, including state and private data centers.

cooperation.title: International Cooperation
cooperation.content: Strengthen cooperation, learn experiences, attract resources and participate in global initiatives.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: Build product protection systems, data security standards, form data protection industry.

leadership.title: Standing Committee of National Data Association (2025-2030)

nguyen_ngoc_cuong.name: Major General Nguyen Ngoc Cuong
nguyen_ngoc_cuong.position: Director of National Data Center, Ministry of Public Security

nguyen_thieu_nam.name: Mr. Nguyen Thieu Nam
nguyen_thieu_nam.position: Deputy General Director of Masan Group

truong_gia_binh.name: Assoc. Prof. Dr. Truong Gia Binh

secretaryGeneral.title: GENERAL SECRETARY
secretaryGeneral.name: Major Dao Duc Trieu
secretaryGeneral.position1: Director of Center for Data Innovation and Exploitation
secretaryGeneral.position2: National Data Center, Ministry of Public Security

establishment.title: Establishment Decision
establishment.content: The National Data Association was established according to Decision No. 10/QD-BNV of the Ministry of Home Affairs, aiming to connect management agencies, enterprises, organizations and individuals operating in the data field.

launch.title: Official Launch Ceremony
launch.content: At the Ministry of Public Security Hall (30 Tran Binh Trong, Hanoi), the National Data Association (NDA) was officially launched, marking an important beginning in building a strong data ecosystem for Vietnam.

firstTerm.title: First Term
firstTerm.content: The Association aims to build a strong data ecosystem, contributing to promoting digital economy development and increasing data value in the national economy.

items.daily: • Manage daily operations of the Association
items.resolutions: • Implement resolutions of the Executive Board
items.cooperation: • Coordinate with member agencies and organizations
items.reports: • Regular reporting to the Executive Board
